tests.name: Scenario 1 - Part 1: South American Cities
tests.run: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content=fs.readFileSync('scenario1.mongodb', 'utf8'); const snippet=content.match(/\/\/ Part 1:[\s\S]*?aggregate\(\[([\s\S]*?)\]\)/)[1]; console.log(JSON.stringify(eval('['+snippet+']')))"
